<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/board/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get specific board message by Id

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"description":"Id of the object, this can be a mongo Id but also a plain string (backwards-compatibility).","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":null,"type":"object","properties":{"exists":{"type":"boolean"},"id":{"description":"Message Id","type":"string"},"content":{"description":"The message itself","type":"object","properties":{"title":{"description":"The title of the message","type":"string"},"message":{"description":"The contents of the message","type":"string"},"writtenBy":{"description":"Id of the member that sent the message","type":"string"},"writtenFor":{"description":"Id of the member that recieved the message","type":"string"},"writtenAt":{"description":"Milliseconds since epoch for this timestamp/date","type":"integer"},"read":{"description":"Whether this message has been read, this must start as false","type":"boolean"},"supportMarkdown":{"description":"Whether this board message supports markdown","type":"boolean"},"uid":{"description":"The user associated with the message","type":"string"},"lastOperationTime":{"description":"Time in milliseconds since epoch of the last operation on this object","type":"string"}},"title":"boardMessage"}}}}},"404":{"description":"NOT FOUND"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
